content: लक्षणं [लक्ष्यतेऽनेन लक्ष्-करणे ल्युट्] {@--1@} A mark, token, sign, indication, characteristic, distinctive mark; बधूदुकूलं कलहंसलक्षणं <ls>Ku. 5. 67</ls>; अनारंभो हि कार्याणां प्रथमं बुद्धिलक्षणं <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; उपकारापकारौ हि लक्ष्यं लक्षणमेतयोः <ls>H. 4. 15</ls>; अव्याक्षेपो भविष्यंत्याः कार्यसिद्धेर्हि लक्षणं <ls>R. 10. 6</ls>, <ls n="R.">19. 47</ls>; गर्भलक्षण <ls>Ś. 5</ls>; पुरुषलक्षणं ‘the sign or organ of virility’. {@--2@} A symptom (of a disease). {@--3@} An attribute, a quality. {@--4@} A definition, accurate description; असाधारणधर्मो लक्षणम्. {@--5@} A lucky or auspicious mark on the body (these are considered to be 32); द्वात्रिंशल्लक्षणोपेतः; लक्षणसंपन्नानां गवामधः सस्नौ <ls>K. 64.</ls> {@--6@} Any mark or features of the body (indicative of good or bad luck); क्व तद्विधस्त्वं क्व च पुण्यलक्षणा <ls>Ku. 5. 73</ls>; क्लेशावहा भर्तुरलक्षणाहं <ls>R. 14. 5.</ls> {@--7@} A name, designation, appellation (<ab>oft.</ab> at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); विदिशालक्षणां राजधानीं <ls>Me. 24.</ls> {@--8@} Excellence, merit, good quality; as in आहितलक्षण <ls>R. 6. 71</ls> (where <ls>Malli.</ls> renders it by प्रख्यातगुण and quotes Ak:-- गुणैः प्रतीते तु कृतलक्षणाहितलक्षणौ). {@--9@} An aim, a scope, an object. {@--10@} A fixed rate (as of duties); <ls>Ms. 8. 406.</ls> {@--11@} Form, kind, nature. {@--12@} Effect, operation. {@--13@} Cause, occasion. {@--14@} Head, topic, subject. {@--15@} Pretence disguise ( = लक्ष); प्रसुप्तलक्षणः <ls>Māl. 7.</ls> {@--16@} A line, spot. {@--17@} Observation, seeing. --णः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Lakṣmaṇa. {@--2@} The crane. --णा {@--1@} An aim, object. {@--2@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) An indirect application or secondary signification of a word, one of the three powers of a word; it is thus defined:--मुख्यार्थबाधे तद्योगे रूढितोऽथ प्रयोजनात् . अन्योर्थो लक्ष्यते यत्सा लक्षणारोपितक्रिया <ls>K. P. 2</ls>; लक्षणा शक्य संबंधस्तात्पर्यानुपपत्तितः <ls>Bhāṣā P.</ls>; see <ls>S. D. 13</ls> also. {@--3@} A goose.
